title: Weird bug preventing movement please help!
body:
Hey everyone, I'm getting this weird bug where my game isn't completely full screen while in-game, I'm getting some sort of header bar or whatever it's called:
 [Screencap](http://imgur.com/a/gL1MN)
Visually, it's not much of a bother to me but for whatever reason I'm not able to move my screen down at all. I'm on free camera mode and everything, and can move my screen in every other direction just fine, but just not down. As you see there's a little bit of my HUD cut off at the bottom of the screen too, and it seems that the bar at the top shifted the whole screen down, so my cursor can't reach the edge of the screen, therefore not letting me move my screen in that direction either. I've tried restarting my PC, my client, everything I can think of but it still keeps happening. My next thing I'll try is just reinstall LoL but I'd rather avoid that if possible because with my internet it'll take forever. If anyone has any ideas or possible solutions the help would be greatly appreciated! thanks

replies.body:
It looks like you have the game set to Windowed.  While in-game, go to your video options and switch Windowed to Borderless or Full Screen.   If you still run into issues, you can reset your config in case something with your settings has gotten corrupt.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that helps!
